summary: Resolved merge conflict in polymarket-bot/README.md by preserving both feature additions: Polymarket API Integration (market_data.py) from HEAD and State Persistence and Logging (state.py) from main. Both features are independent and complementary.
strategyUsed: preserved both changes - merged project structure to include both market_data.py and state.py modules, kept both documentation sections (Polymarket API Integration and State Persistence), and combined test commands to reference both test_market_data.py and test_state.py
